lead_paragraph: Saracens back-row forward Jacques Burger has decided to call time on his illustrious rugby career and will play his final game against Newcastle Falcons in the Premiership at Allianz Park on Sunday.
snippet: Saracens back-row forward Jacques Burger has decided to call time on his illustrious rugby career and will play his final game against Newcastle Falcons in the Premiership at Allianz Park on Sunday....
